missing_paths_property: [Missing Paths Property] Manifest entries of this build type require a 'paths' property.
invalid_path_fragment: [Invalid Path Fragment] The path fragment value must be a string that follows the path-fragment notation.
invalid_root: [Invalid Root] The path's root is invalid; the path must be absolute.
invalid_path_list: [Invalid Path List] The path list must be an array of iPathInfo.
invalid_repos_propery: [Invalid Repos Property] The 'repos' property must be an array of {iRepoMeta} instances.
invalid_repo_meta: [Invalid Repo Meta] The repo meta object must conform to the {iRepoMeta} interface.
invalid_repo_type: [Invalid Repo Type] The repo type does not exist in the repository list.
file_path_load: [File Path Load] Failed to load 1 or more file paths.
duplicate_namespace: [Duplicate Namespace] One or more namespaces has been used more than once.
invalid_build_path: [Invalid Build Path] The value did not match the build path pattern.
invalid_paths_property: [Invalid Files Property] The files property should be an array.
invalid_dependency_annotation: [Invalid Dependency Annotation] The factory dependency annotations must use dependency notation.
EACCES: (Permission denied): An attempt was made to access a file in a way forbidden by its file access permissions.
EEXIST: (File exists): An existing file was the target of an operation that required that the target not exist.
EISDIR: (Is a directory): An operation expected a file, but the given pathname was a directory.
EMFILE: (Too many open files in system): Maximum number of file descriptors allowable on the system has been reached, and requests for another descriptor cannot be fulfilled until at least one has been closed.
ENOENT: (No such file or directory): No entity (file or directory) could be found by the given path.
ENOTDIR: (Not a directory): A component of the given pathname existed, but was not a directory as expected.
EPERM: (Operation not permitted): An attempt was made to perform an operation that requires elevated privileges.
